18#include <cstdint>
19#include <cstddef>
20#include <string>
21
22namespace ZXing {
23
24class TextUtfEncoding
25{
26public:
27 static std::string ToUtf8(const std::wstring& str);
28 static std::wstring FromUtf8(const std::string& utf8);
29
30 static void ToUtf8(const std::wstring& str, std::string& utf8);
31 static void AppendUtf16(std::wstring& str, const uint16_t* utf16, size_t length);
32 static void AppendUtf8(std::wstring& str, const uint8_t* utf8, size_t length);
33
34 template <typename T>
35 static bool IsUtf16HighSurrogate(T c)
36 {
37 return (c & 0xfc00) == 0xd800;
38 }
39
40 template <typename T>
41 static bool IsUtf16LowSurrogate(T c)
42 {
43 return (c & 0xfc00) == 0xdc00;
44 }
45
46 template <typename T>
47 static uint32_t CodePointFromUtf16Surrogates(T high, T low)
48 {
49 return (uint32_t(high) << 10) + low - 0x35fdc00;
50 }
51};
52
53} // ZXing
54
